dmca.title: Copyright Infringement Notice - Multiple Sites
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

 

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

 

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

 

Please visit our web site at
www.theplanet.com/about_us/legal_docs/ThePlanet%20Copyright%20Infringeme
nt%2001%2015%2007%20FINAL.pdf

 

Legal Response Team

THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

 

 

________________________________

From: Andrew Sernekos [mailto:as5@sernekos.com] 
Sent: Thursday, May 03, 2007 9:39 PM
To: Copyright
Subject: Copyright Infringement Notice - Multiple Sites

 

To whom it may concern: 

I am the legal owner and copyright holder of
http://sugargliderauthority.com, as well the book, Sugar Gliders: The
Ultimate Guide. 

In addition to the 2 domains I have previously notified you about, 8
additional domains served by theplanet.com have scraped my website and
copied my copyrighted text. In fact, this person or entity has also
scraped and copied my copyright notice! You can see the offending
material at: 

<http://www.sellhome4.info/meat.htm>
http://www.carhire4.info/Chicken.htm

http://www.businessgift4.info/goats.htm

http://www.adulteducation4.info/chocolate.htm

http://www.disneylandhotel4.info/Cow.htm

http://petdoor4.info/Animals.htm

http://cdcase4.info/Blueberrys.htm

http://www.gourmetcoffee4.info/Dogs.htm

http://www.dvdduplication4.info/cooked.htm

On each page, in addition to the copyrighted material, you will see my
copyright notice, which reads as follows:

(c) 2006 SugarGliderAuthority.com. Excerpted from Sugar Gliders: The
Ultimate Guide. All rights reserved. No portion of this website may be
reproduced in whole or in part without the express written consent of
the copyright owner.

The webpage that contains my copyrighted material MUST be taken
down/removed immediately, to avoid further legal action on my part. 

Sincerely, 

Andrew Sernekos 
The Sernekos Group, Inc. 
856-694-0377
